actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to commend Agents Mccarthy and Parr and Officer Delahanty for their unselfish courage and patriotism during the recent attempt on the life of the President of the United States.

summary.text: Commends Secret Service Agents Timothy McCarthy and Jerry Parr and Metropolitan Officer Thomas Delahanty for their performance in the line of duty with respect to the assassination attempt on the life of the President.

titles.title: A resolution to commend Agents Mccarthy and Parr and Officer Delahanty for their unselfish courage and patriotism during the recent attempt on the life of the President of the United States.
